scripts.setup-python-env: python3 -m venv venv && venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup-windows-python-env: python3 -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install-python-deps: npm run setup-python-env || npm run setup-windows-python-env
scripts.start: npm run install-python-deps && npm run start-backend
scripts.start-windows: npm run setup-windows-python-env && npm run start-backend
scripts.start-full: npm run start & npm run dev
